channel.title: Testing on Code Strokes
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Code Strokes

item.title: What is a Unit Test?
item.description: I’m taking a Software Testing and Verification course as part of my Master’s work. Our first assignment was to write a short paper describing a unit test, then implement selection sort and test it under that philosophy. Sarcastically, I commented to my colleagues the triviality of this question. The first response was, “Wow, I don’t think that is such an easy question.” A technical discussion ensued. This is that log.
